questions.question: 2021 - Consider Alice and Bob had an exchange of messages using an instant chat messenger. Those messages were quite damaging for Alice, so she filed a court case. However, Bob gave a statement that he did not send any of those messages. Imagine you are a case investigator who has to provide an opinion solely based on the security mechanism used by the messager. Which one of the following security mechanisms can guarantee that Bob sent those messages?
2021 - Q2 - When a secure channel is used for achieving confidentiality, an eavesdropper CANNOT easily learn ___?
2021 - Q3 - Which statement is FALSE about GDPR consent?
options: Consent is an easily accessible form

questions.question: 2021 - Q4 - What is FALSE about GDPR’s data breach notification?
options: Companies holding the data of EU citizens are responsible for data breach notifications
A data processor is required to notify customers about data breaches
A data controller is required to notify customers about data breaches
Companies must notify customers within 72 hours no matter a data breach has been identified or not
questions.answer: Companies must notify customers within 72 hours no matter a data breach has been identified or not

questions.question: 2021 - Q5 - Recall that a mode of operation is used for encrypting large messages. Which of the following modes of operation can enable parallelism in both encrypting and decrypting data?
options: None of ECB, CBC, and CTR
All of ECB, CBC, and CTR
